summary: This mod adds Algus from Final Fantasy Tactics to Skyrim. This stuck up, commoner-hating, prejudiced s'wit can be found hanging out at the Winking Skeever in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Final Fantasy Tactics Algus Thadalfus Follower[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=3]This is just my attempt at making Algus (albeit the hair is off and the face is 'eh') . This stuck up, commoner-hating, prejudiced s'wit can be found hanging out at the Winking Skeever in Solitude.

He comes wearing prisoner garb by default (so that he doesn't appear nude and so that he will wear whatever you give him). He wields a steel sword and a crossbow with Dwarven bolts, perfect for sniping commoner scum.

On an unreleated note; I realize that his name has been 'Argath' since the PSP port of Tactics "The War of the Lions", HOWEVER like with  'AERITH' I much much more prefer Algus/Aeris (I also don't sound like Sylvester the cat when saying his name), but if the name bugs you, you can probably change it via console '(target) setname' or via the creationkit. 

[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Marriageable [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Lightfoot Perk (will not set off traps)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Several Light Armor Perks[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3]One-handed Perks[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Archery Perks[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Mastered Juggernaut (Heavy Armor) perk[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Optional but Recommended Mods (Not included in my mod)[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#ffffff][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76890/]FFXIV A Ream Reborn Excalibur [/url][/color]by Rurotan2032[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25832/]Crimson Ranger Armor[/url]﻿ by Patobek [/size][/font]
[/list]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Big Thanks to [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies[/url]﻿ for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for the Eyes of Beauty [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Cloudedtruth[/url]﻿ for Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
